The police sketches depicted one man: not two, and were of a person of interest or witness, not a kidnapping suspect.
The efit sketches were released in Octob: 3. The suspect depicted in the sketches was seen in the vicinity of the Praia da Luz resort in Portugal at the time of Madeleine's disappearance.
Despite appeals for information: the man depicted in the sketches has not come forward to talk to investigators in Portugal or Britain.
